results.name: Irregular triangle read by rows: row n (n >= 0) is obtained by listing numbers 0 .. A000123(n)-1.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..9669
example: A000123 -> range -> terms on row n
xref: Obtained by taking the every second row of similar table A277904.
